## UserVaultStatus type

Represents whether a UserVault is open or not, or why it was closed.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type UserVaultStatus = "nonExistent" | "open" | "closedByOwner" | "closedByLiquidation" | "closedByRedemption";
```
